alert.note: Alert for St Lawrence Island (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued November 20 at 6:26AM AKST until November 20 at 3:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM AKST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Large breaking waves will wash to the top of the beach. * WHERE...St Lawrence Island. * WHEN...Until 3 PM AKST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Localized beach erosion may occur. Minor flooding of low lying areas along the coast is possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Southerly gales over the Northern Bering Sea and the Chukchi Sea will continue into Monday night, then decrease slowly on Tuesday. This will cause sea levels to rise two to four feet above the normal high tide line and waves will push to the top of the beach. The worst conditions will be along south facing shores. This may impact the Gambell dump.
info.instruction: Precautions should be taken to protect property.
